amendment.description: Amendment changes the definition of Container Security Device (CSD) in the bill to require that a CSD positively identify the container, detect and record any unauthorized intrusion of the container, and have a false alarm rate that is demonstrated to be below 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-450 to amend the definition of a cargo container security device in Sec. 1816 from: `a mechanical or electronic device designed to, at a minimum, detect unauthorized intrusion of containers', to `a mechanical or electronic device designed to, at a minimum, positively identify containers and detect and record unauthorized intrusion of containers. Such devices shall have false alarm rates that have been demonstrated to be below one percent.".
